text: Any way to set section/row/column alignment, padding etc. defaults when user drags a new module onto the page, creating new structure?

Right now there is no way to set a default for all new content to be a certain way.

Do you have any thoughts around how youâ€™d want that control to work? how would you want to code those defaults? what should happen if you change a default in the template but pages already exist?
